title: I have level 1 honor, will I still get end of season rewards?
body: So I got chat restricted a couple months back and I don't play on my main too often so I'm currently only honor level 1. I currently don't have a chat restriction and my account was never actually banned from playing games. Will I still be able to get end of season awards. This is the first season I've been able to hit plat and it'd be a real bummer if I couldn't even get the border :/. Also I have a lock on the level if that matters at all?

replies.body: Chat restrictions will only disqualify you if it's active on the day that the season ends! That one from months ago shouldn't affect you.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yzA6pmvw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-08T21:01:24.699+0000)
>
> Chat restrictions will only disqualify you if it's active on the day that the season ends! That one from months ago shouldn't affect you.

Hello, 

So I got banned for two weeks yesterday  for joking with a friend and I think someone took offence, anyway the ban will be active until November 3rd. I was wondering of that means I will be ineligible for this year’s rewards? Also I’d like to know if there is a way to see how much you get reported because I did not get any warnings and had a solid level 4 honor. I understand that you cannot be unbanned but I believe in this case it wasn’t entirely justified. 
Thank you for your time!

> [{quoted}](name=SwagnemiteNuke,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yzA6pmvw,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-10-21T13:24:29.042+0000)
>
> Hello, 
> 
> So I got banned for two weeks yesterday  for joking with a friend and I think someone took offence, anyway the ban will be active until November 3rd. I was wondering of that means I will be ineligible for this year’s rewards? Also I’d like to know if there is a way to see how much you get reported because I did not get any warnings and had a solid level 4 honor. I understand that you cannot be unbanned but I believe in this case it wasn’t entirely justified. 
> Thank you for your time!

Just to clarify, the suspension notification says that I can get my rewards if I become honorable again, but I read that you cannot be banned after 22/08/17 and still be eligible for end of season rewards.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yzA6pmvw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-08T21:01:24.699+0000)
>
> Chat restrictions will only disqualify you if it's active on the day that the season ends! That one from months ago shouldn't affect you.

Thank you! That's a huge relief.
